name: Elementalists (MikeFarrant)
description:
Elementalists is a four player coop focused wave defence game in which four wizards must fend off waves of angry villagers and knights, defending their tower by hurling elemental spells at the aggressors.

Best player with four players via controllers.

Small student project made by a team of four:

Ashley Edwards : Contributor

Ben Chittenden : Lead Programmer

Maggie Tasic : Lead Artist

Mike Farrant : Producer
